projects.title: Bug Tracker
projects.description: An app used for creating tickets and managing projects and users working on those projects.

tickets.title: Fix error when opening create ticket page when no projects are available.
tickets.content: When opening the create ticket page when there are no projects, it would throw an error of getting undefined when accessing id.

tickets.title: Display charts with stats in project details page
tickets.content:
Have some charts that display:
- A donut chart to display amount of total open tickets and tickets for each priority level and possibly another for status of tickets

tickets.title: By default do not show completed tickets in ticket filter
Have a link to create tickets from the project page
tickets.content: This should also set the project Id to already be set from the project it was just previously on. For an example when creating a ticket from the project with name "A" it should set that ticket's project Id to "A" in the create form by default.

tickets.title: Display a footer in the workspace layout
